name: college-erp-dashboards
description: College ERP System with multiple role-based dashboards

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:faculty" "npm run start:family" "npm run start:student"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:admin && npm run build:faculty && npm run build:student
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend/college-erp-dashboard && npm install && cd ../faculty-dashboard && npm install && cd ../student-dashboard && npm install
